Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Brooks "-A.J."
Reviews.Content: I got this camera at Walmart at the beginning of the summer. The actual quality of the pictures are great. My main complaint is that you're lucky if the pictures don't turn out blurry. I always end up putting it on Fast-moving Subjects mode. Then the pictures usually turn up good. The only time this really bothers me is if a room is dark and I need to take a picture in night mode. Then it either turns out bright and blurry or dark.

Reviews.Title: Cute at first
Reviews.Author: Lorraine C. "LoCo"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera from Walmart over a year ago and it has been great up until lately.  I'm not sure if it is a battery problem, but I'll know more once I get the battery that I ordered.  The charger may be the problem too-only time will tell, but I'll never buy from Wal-Mart again!

Reviews.Title: Sanyo X1400
Reviews.Author: SusieQ
Reviews.Content: My teenage daughter purchased this camera and by the time she had owned it 4 months, it already had a "System Error" which the manual indicates requires professional repair.  Of course, the Walmart warranty was only for 30 days, so we're out of luck.  This is the second Sanyo camera which we had purchased for her and the first Sanyo (VPC-S880) also stopped working after about a year and a half.  We will not ever purchase another Sanyo camera, they are garbage.

Reviews.Title: the camara doen not have a little spot. it is totally blind
Reviews.Author: eder apolinar castro pelayo
Reviews.Content: the camara doen not have a little spot. it is totally blind. the user do not specify that in its descritption

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Barbara Trivitt
Reviews.Content: I see most of the reviews on here are terrible. I've had mine for 3 years and it still goes strong. The picture quality is great for a 14mp. They're clear and crisp. All of the different options turn out great. I've never had a problem with it.

Reviews.Title: I Hate this camera, not gonna to buy any sayon stuff anymore!!!
Reviews.Author: yiluka
Reviews.Content: I bought this in walmart, because that was the only one left there. My requirement for camera is very low. Basically, I just want to have a small camera that can take photos with no blurry, and that was it. I do not zoom it or anything, but the camera just does not work at all. So I rarely use it, but it still broke, without me even touch it... Surprising, it broke right after the 3 month warranty. I turn it on, and the lens start to make a weird noise, come in and out, and the screen shows a line saying "system error." and it turned off by itself. I did research about that online, and it seems to be an issue to all Sayon cameras. I am taking Industrial design major, and I have been taught in school that there are some evil companies try to make their products unsustainable, so that you can keep buying their product; Sayon is surely one of them.

ProductInfo.Features:
14 Megapixels
28mm Wide Angle Lens
4x Optical Zoom
720 HD Video
3 inch 16:9 LCD screen
ProductInfo.Name: Blue Sanyo VPC-X1400 14mp Digital Camera with Wide Angle 4x Optical Zoom
